migrations.name: 001_initial_schema
migrations.description: Initial database schema with tasks, sections, disputes, and audit tables

migrations.name: 002_add_commit_sha
migrations.description: Add commit_sha column to audit table for tracking commits per status change

migrations.name: 003_add_section_priority
migrations.description: Add priority column to sections table (0=highest, 100=lowest, 50=default)

migrations.name: 004_add_section_dependencies
migrations.description: Add section_dependencies table for tracking section dependencies

migrations.name: 005_add_audit_actor_model
migrations.description: Add actor_type and model columns to audit table for better tracking

migrations.name: 006_add_task_invocations
migrations.description: Add task_invocations table for per-task LLM prompt/response logging

migrations.name: 007_add_file_anchor
migrations.description: Add file anchor columns (file_path, file_line, file_commit_sha, file_content_hash) to tasks table

migrations.name: 008_add_section_skipped
migrations.description: Add skipped column to sections table for excluding sections from runner

migrations.name: 009_add_incidents_and_failure_tracking
migrations.description: Add incidents table and task failure counters for stuck-task recovery

migrations.name: 010_add_lifecycle_timestamps
migrations.description: Add started_at_ms, completed_at_ms, and status columns to task_invocations for lifecycle tracking

migrations.name: 011_add_merge_locks_and_progress
migrations.description: Add merge lock and merge progress tables for parallel merge workflow

migrations.name: 012_add_merge_lock_epoch
migrations.description: Add lock_epoch column for merge lock fencing semantics

migrations.name: 013_add_merge_progress_applied_commit_sha
migrations.description: Add applied commit SHA column and uniqueness indexes to merge_progress

migrations.name: 014_add_session_context
migrations.description: Add session context and token usage to task_invocations

migrations.name: 015_add_follow_up_fields
migrations.description: Add follow-up task fields to support non-blocking improvements

migrations.name: 016_add_invocation_activity_timestamp
migrations.description: Add last_activity_at_ms to task_invocations for smart hanging detection
